ç°æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®æ¸…æ´—ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚æœ‰å¤šå±‚å¾ªç¯ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ä¼ªä»£ç ã€‚ æˆ‘çš„é—®é¢˜æ˜¯ï¼šå½“ cleanedCount è¾¾åˆ° 1 ç™¾ä¸‡æ¡æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œè¦åœæ­¢æ•´ä¸ªæ¸…æ´—ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚éš¾é“è¦ä¸€å±‚ä¸€å±‚ return å‡ºå»ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ 

class CleanData{

  // å·²æ¸…æ´—æ•°æ®é‡
  cleanedCount ï¼›

  // è¿ç§»ä»»åŠ¡
  method cleanByTask() {
    activityIdList.foreach{activityId -> cleanByActivity(activityId)}
  }

  // æŒ‰æ´»åŠ¨
  method cleanByActivity(activityId) {
    tables.foreach{table -> cleanByTable(table)}
  }

  // æŒ‰è¡¨
  method cleanByTable(table) {
    timeSplits.foreach{timeSplit -> cleanByTimeSplit(timeSplit)}
  }
  
  // æŒ‰æ—¶é—´åˆ‡ç‰‡
  method cleanByTimeSplit(timeSplit) {
    æ¯ 500 æ¡.foreach{500 æ¡ -> cleanByCount(500 æ¡)}
  }

  // æŒ‰æ•°é‡
  method cleanByCount(500 æ¡) {
    cleanedCount += 500
    if (cleanedCount >= 1000000) {
      reurn;
    }
  }

}
